thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 11 of 265
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: Creative chefs, excellent recipes, & outstanding customer service. Farm-to-table fresh ingredients. We love the variety & use of seasonal produce. Being able to get FIVE meals per week in the 2-person Classic Plan (instead of the average 3 per week the competition offers) is a definite plus. The portions are generous; enough for myself & my 2 sons! NO FOOD WASTE! My fridge is no longer a graveyard for forgotten leftovers or extra ingredients that nobody can seem to find...or remember once the refrigerator door closes. It's truly wonderful having 5 new & different meals to enjoy every week without doing anything more than deciding which ones to choose. Thank you!
